title: Evening Forecast for December 28, 2023 | Video | channel3000.com
text: [] Evening Forecast for December 28, 2023 - [Nikki Haley seeks to clarify Civil War comments as backlash mounts: ‘Of course I know it’s about slavery’](/news/shareable-stories/haley-election-civil-war-slavery/article_a824e738-c00f-5b27-9c18-177b775d34e3.html) - [Fire at Madison apartment blamed on improperly discarded smoking materials](/news/fire-at-madison-apartment-blamed-on-improperly-discarded-smoking-materials/article_04f4778c-a5ae-11ee-9a08-cffafd7aed7d.html) - [Madison police to conduct extra patrols citywide next month](/news/madison-police-to-conduct-extra-patrols-citywide-next-month/article_0863bf8c-a5ad-11ee-9979-5b5ed47e2d54.html) - [#MoreLoveLessHate: Downtown Madison restaurant reopens following suspected hate crime](/news/morelovelesshate-downtown-madison-restaurant-reopens-following-suspected-hate-crime/article_a6a51392-a5aa-11ee-b43e-73a65e0f9fd0.html) - [These were the most popular baby names at Madison's hospitals in 2023](/news/these-were-the-most-popular-baby-names-at-madisons-hospitals-in-2023/article_1c3f9058-a59e-11ee-86f7-5b4b9eb72942.html)
